com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.adapter

Class DynamicFragmentsAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • FragmentStatePagerAdapter
      • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.adapter.DynamicFragmentsAdapter

  • public abstract class DynamicFragmentsAdapter
extends FragmentStatePagerAdapter
    FragmentStatePagerAdapter that caches each pages.

    FragmentStatePagerAdapter is also originally caches pages, but its keys are not public nor documented, so depending on how it create cache key is dangerous.

    This adapter caches pages by itself and provide getter method to the cache.

      • getItem

        public Fragment getItem(int position)
        Get a new fragment instance.

        Each fragments are automatically cached in this method, so you don't have to do it by yourself. If you want to implement instantiation of fragments, you should override createItem(int) instead.

        Parameters:
        position - The position of the item in the adapter.
        Returns:
        The fragment instance.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The fragment instance.

      • createItem

        protected abstract Fragment createItem(int position)
        Create a new fragment instance.

        This will be called inside getItem(int).

        Parameters:
        position - The position of the item in the adapter.
        Returns:
        The fragment instance.

      • createCacheIndex

        protected String createCacheIndex(int index)
        Create an index string for caching fragment pages.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the item in the adapter.
        Returns:
        The key string for caching fragment pages.

      • createCacheKey

        protected String createCacheKey(int position)
